OrgName.entry: MULTIPLE SCLEROSIS SOCIETY, ROTHERHAM & SHEFFIELD BRANCH

Desc.entry: A registered charity that offers support to MS sufferers and their families. Provides funding for necessary house alterations and equipment. Offers physiotherapy at a subsidised rate, has a support group once per month and organises exercise classes and social events.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Fridays (physiotherapy), please contact for details of groups
